name: tsan2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))
-| wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))
-| wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wn(w1), wn(wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wn(w1), wn(wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w1), wn(wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wn(wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wn(wa(w1, w2)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical conjunction, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
